about.title: Thibaut VALEZ | Learn more
about.description: Three main skills to launch and empower your projects: Strategic thinking, Technical knowledge, Agile management

qa.title: Q&A
qa.question-a: Product Manager ? Agile Coach ? you seem to have a technical background...
qa.answer-a: I wrote a complete article here about this subject (in french) and why my technical background is a strength in my Product Manager Job.

skills.title:
Three main skills
to launch and empower your projects
skills.strategy:
My vision about Product Management is based on Lean Startup. I experienced it in various context. I use OKR to set goals and visual management tools as Value Stream Map to pilot. Then, with metrics like AARRR and feedbacks, accelerate and make the product grow.
From an idea to a concrete product that fits the market. From vision to task management. From roadmap to customer satisfaction survey. From Business Model Canvas to Growth. Let's get your product fly !

My most importants experiences in this domain: Club Citrus, Digisthesia
skills.agile:
To help teams and people to improve with SCRUM and to evangelize agile manifesto are part of my everyday life since many years now. I like to work in a continuous improvement and agile environment.
From Components teams to Feature teams, remove obstacles, conducts various meetings, find a great tempo and promote human interactions are the keys in this approach.
Scrum Master and Product Owner certified (2016). SAFe 5 Agilist certified (January 2022).

My most importants experiences in this domain: Loyalty Company, Kering, Keyrus, Aktome
skills.technical:
With a background in web and mobile development and as a DevOps promoter, I have good undestanding of what the team needs to be efficient. I also can translate the tech languages from dev and data teams to business ones (and vice-versa). I evolved in various tech environments: from Microsoft to On Premise and AWS, from Javascript (React, Svelte, Backbone) to NodeJS or PHP, from web analytics to search engines. With this skills, I can identify innovative business levers.

My most importants experiences in this domain: Michelin, L'Oreal, SNCF
